channel.title: The "connecting" message
channel.description: This is gonna sound dumb but I am editing the Ultimate-PvP Client atm and when it loads above the bar it says Connecting to Ultimate-PvP or something. I was wondering how to change that. Please dont go into super-coder mode and post lines of code, just tell me in easy steps cuz i am new to coding.

item.title: The "connecting" message
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

edit:
sorry… misread

[b]ctrl+f

  public final void method84(String s, String s1, boolean flag)

edit where it says “Connecting to server…” to desired text. Just replace if(!flag), down to } with the below if you’re not sure what to do.

if(!flag) { aString1266 = ""; aString1267 = "Connecting to server..."; method135(true, false); }

Read full topic
